title: Jordyn and the Caverns of Gloom
description: Lies.My so-called family lied.My friends lied.The only guy I ever liked lied.My mentor, the one I was supposed to trust lied.My entire existence is built on lies and yet now they want my help. Scratch that, nowthey need my help. I'll play the good soldier, but I am no longer the person I was before. This time it will be on my terms. I will trust no one.I am a weapon. I am Jordyn.
author: Tiffany King
